alert.note: Alert for Angelina; Houston; Polk; Trinity; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 29 at 8:49AM CST until January 02 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River Near Diboll affecting Houston, Tyler, Trinity, Polk and Angelina Counties. For the Neches River...including Lake Palestine, Neches, Alto, Diboll, Rockland...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River Near Diboll. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs. Expect flooded boat ramps and trails. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Thursday the stage was 3.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.4 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 900 AM CST.
